message.body: Sorry, running a couple min late. Be there in about 15 min.
Hey, when we're sending out emails to our personal contacts, do the emails have to come from the textpenn email address?
No I think Dana said they could be from personal accounts but u may want to double check. I sent mine from my gmail account.
Yep, personal. I sent that to both you and Dana and already heard back from her. Think the interview went well. Not totally positive.
Sorry I was on the go for that last txt. I meant to say that I'm sure they realize you are totally qualified.
It's all good, I was in a rush, and have been occupied for a hot min. But many thx for the vote of confidence. We'll see what goes on.
